document.full_text: the pentagon's top arms buyer on wednesday predicted more scrapping of big-ticket arms programs starting as soon as the 2013 fiscal year due to tightening u.s. defense budgets.
document.title: u.s. arms buyer predicts more big-ticket cuts
lines_and_colors: the pentagon's top arms buyer on wednesday predicted more scrapping of big-ticket arms programs starting as soon as the 2013 fiscal year due to tightening u.s. defense budgets.
